net.zzh.common.web

类 RestPreconditions

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zzh.common.web.RestPreconditions

  • public final class RestPreconditions
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple static methods to be called at the start of your own methods to verify correct arguments and state. If the Precondition fails, an HttpStatus code is thrown

    • 构造器概要

    • 方法详细资料

      • checkNotNull

        public static <T> T checkNotNull(T reference)
        Ensures that an object reference passed as a parameter to the calling method is not null.
        参数:
        reference - an object reference
        返回:
        the non-null reference that was validated
        抛出:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if reference is null

      • checkRequestElementNotNull

        public static <T> T checkRequestElementNotNull(T reference)
        Ensures that an object reference passed as a parameter to the calling method is not null.
        参数:
        reference - an object reference
        返回:
        the non-null reference that was validated
        抛出:
        ConflictException - if reference is null

      • checkRequestState

        public static void checkRequestState(boolean expression)
        Ensures the truth of an expression
        参数:
        expression - a boolean expression

      • checkFound

        public static void checkFound(boolean expression)
        Check if some value was found, otherwise throw exception.
        参数:
        expression - has value true if found, otherwise false
        抛出:
        ResourceNotFoundException - if expression is false, means value not found.

      • checkAllowed

        public static void checkAllowed(boolean expression)
        Check if some value was found, otherwise throw exception.
        参数:
        expression - has value true if found, otherwise false
        抛出:
        ForbiddenException - if expression is false, means operation not allowed.
